name: ort
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small piece of something, especially of food that has not been eaten: He ran forward, picked up the orts of bread, and ate them. He sat down and ate, occasionally throwing the other man a morsel of his orts.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cleansing teams cleared away the vegetable waste, the paper bags, the scraps and orts of the market.The traps were baited with seed and whatever tasty orts were available.Their clothes were not smeared by any ort.
